name: The Heart of the Dungeon
description:
You are the chef who has the power to FLIP between realms. They come to this ailing village standing between LIFE and DEATH to seek the power of the 'Heart of the Dungeon.' Traverse through 4 dungeons, themed after the flavors of Sweet, Salty, Sour, and Spicy.


CONTROLS

W - Move Up

A - Move Left

S - Move Down

 D - Move Right

Q - Turn Left

E - Turn Right

Space - FLIP between the overworld and dungeon, Attack while in Combat, Progress through dialogue

I - Access Inventory

ESC - Menu

P - End game/see end story

FEATURES

  • Press SPACE to FLIP between the dungeons and the overworld (Can only flip around the base tavern area)
  • Talk to NPCs to hear their meal requests
  • Cook recipes at the Cooking Station using monster parts
  • Fight a variety of monsters along with the 4 Guardians of Sweet, Salty, Sour, and Spicy flavors to discover the true power of the heart
  • Hit monsters with your frying pan

Known Bugs: (Currently in further development, fixes will be posted after the voting window)

  • The portals do not work and thus block portions of the game (fixed)
  • Boss ingredient spawn is large  (fixed)
  • Death screen does not properly appear (fixed)
  • Some items don't give health
